elements.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/holidayList endpoint with invalid authorization credentials,
elements.description:
the expected status code returned should be 401,
  and the message in the response body should confirm: "Unauthenticated.".

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.
The api user sets "api/holidayList" path parameters

steps.name: The API user sends a GET request and records the response from the api refundReasonList endpoint.
The api user verifies that the status code is 401
The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "Unauthenticated"

name: As an administrator, I should be able to access holiday data for staff members via API connection.
